notifications.title: A Warm Welcome to Mai Muhammad, Our New Organizational Development Section Head ❤️❤️❤️
notifications.message:
Dear T&C Family,

We’re thrilled to share the exciting news of Ms. Mai Muhammad’s appointment as our new Organizational Development Section Head.
Mai brings with her over six years of comprehensive experience across the full spectrum of Human Resources functions.
Throughout her career, Mai has played a key role in shaping HR frameworks, streamlining processes, and fostering cultures of collaboration and continuous improvement. Her leadership in organizational development will be instrumental in aligning people strategies with business goals and enhancing employee experience across the board.

You can reach Mai through email mai.muhammad@tcgarments.com

Please join us in giving Mai a warm welcome as she embarks on this exciting new chapter.
We are confident that her impact will be both immediate and lasting.

Warm regards,
HR Department
T&C Garment
